page.title: 03Family Life Today
page.content: We go out to very special treats about once a month and ordinary trips about twice a week. We're all together except for Dad who does at least 10 hours of farming each day, but he's off for about 3 hours on a Sunday. I don't know what they think about my personality, but this is what I think of theirs, my brother is a pest because he always does what he's told not to do, he jumps to conclusions, he shouts when he realises that I'm reading, he even jumps on my bed in the morning when I'm sleeping.My mum is fine until my brother does the twist and sends mum round the bend, then I start getting blamed because I have'nt taught him good manners, as if it was my fault! My dad is my favourite person,he's good fun, good tempered and rarely moody.
